Key.Original: Please wait while mission is generating
Key.English: Please wait while mission is generating
Key.French: Génération de la mission en cours merci de patienter
Recherche des meilleurs emplacements de missions

Key.Original: Generating opfor patrols, mortars and FOB
Key.English: Generating opfor patrols, mortars and FOB

Key.Original: Contact civilians at %1 to get tasks
Key.English: Prendre contact avec les civils près de %1. Ils sauront vous donner les localisations des objectifs clefs de la région.

Key.Original: Return to your initial base or extract area of operation
Key.English: Return to your initial base or extract area of operation
Key.French: Retournez à votre base ou quittez la zone de mission

Key.Original: There's %1 near %2. Can you bring it to %3...
Key.English: There's %1 near %2. Can you bring it to %3...
Key.French: %1 a été repéré près de %2. Pouvez-vous l'apporter à %3

Key.Original: There's %1 near %2. Can you bring it to %3 or destroy it...
Key.English: There's %1 near %2. Can you bring it to %3 or destroy it...
Key.French: Il y a une %1 près de %2. Pouvez vous l'apporter à %3 ou bien la détruire

Key.Original: There's an enemy %1 near %2. You have to kill him...
Key.English: There's an enemy %1 near %2. You have to kill him...
Key.French: Il y a une cible importante %1 à %2. Vous devez l'éliminer...

Key.Original: I have a friend who's captured near %2. He looks like %1. Can you bring it to %3...
Key.English: I have a friend who's captured near %2. He looks like %1. Can you bring it to %3...
Key.French: J'ai un ami qui s'est fait capturé près de %2. Il ressemble à %1. Pouvez-vous l'apporter à %3

Key.Original: Thank you, i can continue by myself
Key.English: Thank you, i can continue by myself
Key.French: Merci, à présent je peux continuer par moi même

Key.Original: I have a spotted the hostage captured near %2. He looks like %1.
Key.English: I have a spotted the hostage captured near %2. He looks like %1.
Key.French: J'ai repéré un otage près de %2. Il ressemble à %1. Vous devez le libérer.

Key.Original: Some people stole our vehicle %1. I think it's located in %2. Can you bring it to %3...
Key.English: Some people stole our vehicle %1. I think it's located in %2. Can you bring it to %3...
Key.French: Un véhicule %1 a été volé. Il a été aperçu vers %2. Vous devez le ramener à %3

Key.Original: I have a friend who lives near %2. He looks like %1. Can you talk to him...
Key.English: I have a friend who lives near %2. He looks like %1. Can you talk to him...
Key.French: Je connais un informateur près de %2. Il ressemble à %1. Il faut aller lui parler.

Key.Original: There is a lot of enemies in %1, you have to clear the location...
Key.English: There is a lot of enemies in %1, you have to clear the location...
Key.French: Vous devez prendre le contrôle de la zone près de %1.

Key.Original: You have to defend ammobox at %1, go to the location, find it and defend it against enemy reinforcement
Key.English: You have to defend ammobox at %1, go to the location, find it and defend it against enemy reinforcement
Key.French: Vous devez protéger la position %1. Il y a une caisse convoitée par l'ennemi. Ils viendront essayer de la récupérer par tous les moyens

Key.Original: There is some enemies in %1, you have to take the location and defend it against enemy reinforcement
Key.English: There is some enemies in %1, you have to take the location and defend it against enemy reinforcement
Key.French: Vous devez prendre le contrôle de %1 puis tenir la position. L'ennemi viendra essayer de vous déloger.

Key.Original: I drop my %1 with a lot of intel about enemy's location in %2. Can you pick it up ?
Key.English: I drop my %1 with a lot of intel about enemy's location in %2. Can you pick it up ?
Key.French: J'ai perdu un %1 avec des informations importantes près de %2. Vous devez le récupérer

Key.Original: You have to capture the flag of the location %2, this place has to be conquered !
Key.English: You have to capture the flag of the location %2, this place has to be conquered !
Key.French: Vous devez capturer le drapeau situé à %2.

Key.Original: You have to control the opfor FOB on position %1.
Key.English: You have to control the opfor FOB on position %1.
Key.French: Vous devez prendre le contrôle de la FOB ennemie près de %1

Key.Original: You have to destroy the enemy air vehicle flying around the AO.
Key.English: You have to destroy the enemy air vehicle flying around the AO.
Key.French: Vous devez détruire le véhicule aérien ennemi au dessus de la zone d'opération.

Key.Original: You have to destroy the armored vehicle spotted earlier on position %1.
Key.English: You have to destroy the armored vehicle spotted earlier on position %1.
Key.French: Vous devez détruire le véhicule blindé ennemi repéré à cette position %1.

Key.Original: You have to destroy the enemy mortar spotted earlier on position %1.
Key.English: You have to destroy the enemy mortar spotted earlier on position %1.
Key.French: Vous devez détruire le mortier ennemi repéré à cette position %1

Key.Original: %1 has been killed by his teammate %2, watch your fire
Key.English: %1 has been killed by his teammate %2, watch your fire
Key.French: %1 a été tué par son coéquipier %2, attention à vos tirs

Key.Original: A civilian and has been killed by %1, watch your fire
Key.English: A civilian and has been killed by %1, watch your fire
Key.French: Un civil a été tué par %1, surveillez vos tirs

Key.Original: %1 has surrender and has been killed by %2, watch your fire
Key.English: %1 has surrender and has been killed by %2, watch your fire
Key.French: %1 s'est rendu et a été tué par %2, attention à vos tirs

Key.Original: Enemy has taken the blufor FOB %1, be ready to defend it
Key.English: Enemy has taken the blufor FOB %1, be ready to defend it
Key.French: L'ennmi a pris le contrôle de la base BLUFOR %1, vous devez la défendre

Key.Original: An opfor reinforcement is coming to %1, be ready
Key.English: An opfor reinforcement is coming to %1, be ready
Key.French: Une vague de renforts ennemis arrive en %1, soyez prêts

Key.Original: An opfor reinforcement is coming to %1, be ready to defend the FOB
Key.English: An opfor reinforcement is coming to %1, be ready to defend the FOB
Key.French: Les renforts ennemis arrivent en %1, soyez prêts à défendre la FOB

Key.Original: Opfor attack has begun on %1, be ready
Key.English: Opfor attack has begun on %1, be ready
Key.French: L'ennemi a lancé une attaque contre la position %1, soyez prêts

Key.Original: A friendly squad will attack %1, could you support them ?
Key.English: A friendly squad will attack %1, could you support them ?
Key.French: Une vague de renforts alliés arrive en %1, vous devez les aider

Key.Original: The FOB at position %1 has been cleared
Key.English: The FOB at position %1 has been cleared
Key.French: La FOB en position %1 a été pacifiée

Key.Original: We have spotted enemies around your position, be ready
Key.English: We have spotted enemies around your position, be ready
Key.French: Nous avons repéré des ennemis aux alentours de votre position, soyez prêts

Key.Original: You don't have enough credit left.
Key.English: You don't have enough credit left.
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas assez de crédit.
De multiples tirs d'artilleries ont été appelés sur la position %1
Une extraction a été appelée en %1

Key.Original: Copy %1, we will send you reinforcement in 60 seconds
Key.English: Copy %1, we will send you reinforcement in 60 seconds
Key.French: Bien reçu %1, nous vous envoyons des renforts. Arrivée estimée dans 60 secondes.

Key.Original: Copy %1, we send you some reinforcement
Key.English: Copy %1, we send you some reinforcement
Key.French: Bien reçu %1, nous vous envoyons des renforts

Key.Original: Copy %1, we send you some help quickly
Key.English: Copy %1, we send you some help quickly
Key.French: Bien reçu %1, nous vous envoyons des renforts maintenant

Key.Original: You must wait before call reinforcements
Key.English: You must wait before call reinforcements
Key.French: Vous devez attendre avant de pouvoir appeler des renforts

Key.Original: There is no need for reinforcements
Key.English: There is no need for reinforcements
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas besoin de renfort

Key.Original: Air drop support called on position %1
Key.English: Air drop support called on position %1
Key.French: Soutiens logistiques envoyés sur la position %1 par voie aérienne
Transport allié en approche sur la position %1
Unité de soutien 800, à vos ordres
Unité de transport 1889, à vos ordres

Key.Original: Logistic unit 1804, ready for air supply
Key.English: Logistic unit 1804, ready for air supply
Key.French: Unité de logistique 1804, à vos ordres

Key.Original: We are ready to take off, let's go !
Key.English: We are ready to take off, let's go !
Key.French: Nous sommes prêts à partir sur votre ordre.

Key.Original: Don't shoot i surrender, please spare me
Key.English: Don't shoot i surrender, please spare me
Key.French: Ne tirez pas, je me rends épargnez moi !

Key.Original: Your leader has setup a reinforcement tent
Key.English: Your leader has setup a reinforcement tent
Key.French: Votre chef a monté une tente de réapparition

Key.Original: This morning i saw a mortar position near %1. I don't know if they are there for you, be careful.
Key.English: This morning i saw a mortar position near %1. I don't know if they are there for you, be careful.
Key.French: J'ai vu une position de mortier ce matin vers %1. Je ne sais pas si ils sont là pour vous mais soyez prudents

Key.Original: There is a mortar position on %1
Key.English: There is a mortar position on %1
Key.French: Il y a une position de mortier près de %1

Key.Original: This morning i saw a turret position near %1. Be careful.
Key.English: This morning i saw a turret position near %1. Be careful.
Key.French: Ce matin j'ai vue une tourelle près de la position %1. Soyez prudents

Key.Original: There is a turret position on %1.
Key.English: There is a turret position on %1.
Key.French: Il y a une tourrelle à la position %1.

Key.Original: I've heard there's soldiers patrolling around %1. About %2 men.
Key.English: I've heard there's soldiers patrolling around %1. About %2 men.
Key.French: J'ai entendu dire qu'une patrouille était autour de %1. Environ %2 hommes.

Key.Original: There are %2 men patrolling on position %1.
Key.English: There are %2 men patrolling on position %1.
Key.French: Il y a %2 hommes patrouillant à la position %1.

Key.Original: I saw a %2 around %1 this morning, be careful...
Key.English: I saw a %2 around %1 this morning, be careful...
Key.French: J'ai vu un %2 autour de %1 ce matin. Soyez prudents...

Key.Original: There is an enemy vehicle %2 on position %1.
Key.English: There is an enemy vehicle %2 on position %1.
Key.French: Il y a un véhicule ennemi de type %2 à la position %1.

Key.Original: I saw a armored vehicle around %1, be careful it's dangerous...
Key.English: I saw a armored vehicle around %1, be careful it's dangerous...
Key.French: J'ai vu un véhicule blindé autoour de %1, attention il est dangereux...

Key.Original: There is a armored vehicle %2 on position %1.
Key.English: There is a armored vehicle %2 on position %1.
Key.French: Il y a un véhicule blindé de type %2 en position %1.

Key.Original: I know there is an enemy base around %1, this location seems dangerous
Key.English: I know there is an enemy base around %1, this location seems dangerous
Key.French: Il y a une base ennemie aux environs de %1. Cet endroit semble très dangereux.

Key.Original: There is an enemy FOB on position %1.
Key.English: There is an enemy FOB on position %1.
Key.French: Il y a une FOB ennemie en position %1

Key.Original: I know there is a group of %2 soldiers defending %1, this location seems dangerous
Key.English: I know there is a group of %2 soldiers defending %1, this location seems dangerous
Key.French: Je sais qu'il y a un groupe de %2 soldats qui défendent %1. Cet endroit est dangereux.
Il y a %2 soldats défendant la position %1

Key.Original: Be careful, there are civilian in %1. Watch your fire...
Key.English: Be careful, there are civilian in %1. Watch your fire...
Key.French: Soyez prudent, il y a des civils à %1. Faites attention à vos tirs.

Key.Original: Be careful, there are civilian on position %1. Watch your fire...
Key.English: Be careful, there are civilian on position %1. Watch your fire...
Key.French: Attention, il y a des civils détectés sur la position %1. Surveillez vos tirs.

Key.Original: No idea what you're talking about !
Key.English: No idea what you're talking about !
Key.French: Je n'ai aucune idée de ce dont vous me parlez.
Quittez la région s'il vous plait

Key.Original: The goal is to complete all the tasks
Key.English: The goal is to complete all the tasks
Key.French: Le but est de compléter tous les objectifs

Key.Original: You can customize your loadout on the ammo box
Key.English: You can customize your loadout on the ammo box
Key.French: Vous pouvez personnaliser votre équipement à la caisse de munitions

Key.Original: You can take every vehicle or buy them
Key.English: You can take every vehicle or buy them
Key.French: Vous pouvez prendre tous les véhicules autour ou en acheter de nouveaux

Key.Original: If you die you will respawn according to the mission settings (timer, objective complete, manual)
Key.English: If you die you will respawn according to the mission settings (timer, objective complete, manual)
Key.French: Si vous mourrez, vous pourrez réapparaitre suivant les paramètres de mission (temps, objectifs, demande)

Key.Original: The leader have access to multiple options such as complete vehicle shop and support shop
Key.English: The leader have access to multiple options such as complete vehicle shop and support shop

Key.Original: The rifleman has a basic class without any speciality
Key.English: The rifleman has a basic class without any speciality

Key.Original: The autorifleman has access to machinegun, he can provide suppressive fire to his teammates
Key.English: The autorifleman has access to machinegun, he can provide suppressive fire to his teammates

Key.Original: The medic has access to Medikit, he's able to heal his teammates
Key.English: The medic has access to Medikit, he's able to heal his teammates

Key.Original: The engineer has access to the toolbox, he can defuse IED and build fortifications
Key.English: The engineer has access to the toolbox, he can defuse IED and build fortifications

Key.Original: The pilot has access to air vehicle shop
Key.English: The pilot has access to air vehicle shop

Key.Original: The grenadier has access to grenade launcher
Key.English: The grenadier has access to grenade launcher

Key.Original: The marksman has access to marksman rifle and accurate scopes
Key.English: The marksman has access to marksman rifle and accurate scopes

Key.Original: The sniper has access to marksman rifle and accurate scopes and specific camoflage
Key.English: The sniper has access to marksman rifle and accurate scopes and specific camoflage

Key.Original: The AT have access to Anti-Tank and Anti-Aircraft launchers
Key.English: The AT have access to Anti-Tank and Anti-Aircraft launchers
